task.title: Remove Memory
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to remove a Translation Memory from RemoteTM.

context.p: When you no longer need a Translation Memory, you may remove it from RemoteTM. Backup your data exporting the memory as TMX before removing it.

step.cmd: Select a memory on the main list by clicking on it.
Click on the Remove Memory button on the main toolbar.
Confirm memory removal on the dialog displayed by the browser.

info.note: Memory removal is permanent and cannot be undone.

taskbody.result: Selected memory is removed and the list of memories is updated.
